sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-steps :current="value">
    <a-step
      class="cursor-pointer"
      v-for="item in stepArr"
      :title="item.title"
      :key="item.key"
      @click="skip(item.key)"
    />
  </a-steps>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'Steps',
  props: {
    stepArr: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => {
        return []
      }
    },
    value: {
      type: Number,
      default: 0
    }
  },
  methods: {
    skip(idx) {
      this.$emit('skip', {
        index: idx
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>
